function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of clear definition for neighborhood and urban parks","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of regulatory focus on ecosystem services function of parks","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Underestimation of park scale and usage categories","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear governance structure for urban green spaces","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate governance leading to crowded urban green spaces","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination in decision-making about urban green spaces","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bias in data collection due to lower percentage of people with cell phones in poor areas.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases due to mobility patterns and visitation to parks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective pandemic response policies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate communication and coordination between park management and health authorities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adaptive governance features","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Managers participating in congresses have access to knowledge and resources, creating a bias in the sample.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sparse literature on latin american urban green spaces","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversity of governance arrangements for parks and green spaces","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recruiting interviewees through personal networks and non-profit organizations","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in visits to national parks across europe","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Surge in visitors to country parks in hong kong","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Interviews with managers of urban green spaces in latin american cities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased recreational activity in urban green spaces during lockdown","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Behavioral adaptions leading to increased visits to urban green areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increase in visits to green areas near urban settlements as safer options","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential increase in health inequalities due to severe restrictions to mobility and park use during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wealthier residents less likely to increase their visits to green spaces during the covid-19 lockdown","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Residents reporting poorer health status during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of management knowledge about the impact of covid-19 on urban green spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in domestic violence due to covid-19 lockdown","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative impact of covid-19 on physical and mental health of residents due to lack of access to urban green spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of clear regulations for protecting urban green spaces","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of governance leading to severe socio-environmental problems","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlooking the role of urban green spaces in mitigating the spread of contagious diseases, such as covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of governance and regulation for urban green spaces, particularly in relation to disease mitigation","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited literature on the role of urban green spaces in disease provision and mitigation, particularly in latin america","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of adaptive environmental governance","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential lethality of covid-19 in latin america","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased visitation to urban green spaces","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of real-time iaq monitoring can lead to delayed detection of unhealthy indoor air conditions, increasing the risk of exposure to contaminants.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient iaq monitoring systems may result in prolonged exposure to poor indoor air quality, especially in rural areas where specific requirements may be overlooked.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and access to iaq monitoring systems for non-tech savvy individuals can hinder the adoption of preventive measures and lead to prolonged exposure to unhealthy indoor air.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on real-time iaq monitoring systems in real scenarios may lead to exposure to contagious diseases if proper precautions are not taken.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased exposure to indoor air pollutants in village areas due to the use of solid fuels, leading to higher risk of respiratory diseases and infections.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on designing suitable iaq management systems for village areas may lead to neglecting the health of rural populations and hindering overall medical health improvement efforts.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive monitoring systems for contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of the impact of environmental factors on indoor air quality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited knowledge of early research studies in the field of indoor air quality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on resistive heating sensors leading to energy consumption","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Realtime monitoring of iaq parameters may introduce privacy concerns for building occupants.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Greater interaction with the physical world through iot increases the risk of cyber attacks and unauthorized access to iaq monitoring systems.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited research on prediction systems for iaq monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low performance of non-iot based iaq monitoring systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges with sensor calibration and practical implementation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
